title: Video-Based Online Training Design for Prenatal Nutrition Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutrition knowledge and understanding of educational assistant roles
context.additional_context: Students engage in practice-oriented educational activities using video-based learning content in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, receiving continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain five or more prenatal nutrition recommendations
Identify three or more inappropriate educational methods for pregnant women and propose revised approaches
Improve self-efficacy by 70% or more during prenatal nutrition education
Analyze video content applying multimedia learning principles and utilize it in instructional design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
